# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variables is the following:

* Short name: `household_id`
* Variable label: `Identification of the participant's household`
* Variable description: `Identification of the participant's household or family ties`
* Domain: `Other administrative variables`
* Value type: `text`
